price: او په آسمانونو او ځمكه كې لويي يوازې هغه لره ده او همغه برلاسى حكمت والا دى.
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡكِبۡرِيَآءُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walahu al-kib'riyāu fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
